General.Name: SoilCoin
General.Description: SOILcoin uses Dagger algorithm to allow the creation of Smart Contracts and Dapps while still allowing Developers to create this features for a lower cost, when buying and transfering SOIL, than other cryptocurrencies that use similar technology (like Ethereum). SoilCoin allows any cryptocurrency protocol to be ran on the SOIL blockchain as a deployed smart contract hosting its own token.
General.Features: SoilCoin has been integrated into the ROKOS OS for Raspberry Pis
General.Technology: SOIL uses DAGGER algorithm. Dagger was creted by Vitalik Buterin and it's a GPU-Friendly, Memory intensive, ASIC-proof consensus algorithm.
